info.title: Dokobit Universal API
info.description: Dokobit Universal API is a versatile tool that enables signing documents internally, within your system, and collecting signatures from 3rd parties, outside your system, across Europe. Document signing occurs in an accountless Dokobit signing (where invited participants can sign documents without registering on the Dokobit portal) interface with your organisationâ€™s branding.

post.description: External signing initiates asynchronous signing request from your system. In this case user receives an email for signing and you will get a callback once he signs the document.

postback_url.description: URL of your system to handle webhooks.

deadline.description: Signing deadline date with specified timezone fragment. Example: 2018-11-05T13:15:30Z.

hard_deadline.description: If set to `true` participants won't be able to sign this document after set `deadline`. Default: `false`.

require_qualified_signatures.description: Allow to sign only with qualified signatures. Default: `false`.

annotation_position.description: You can choose the position of signature annotations on a PDF document. Available values: `first_top`, `first_bottom`, `last_top`, `last_bottom`, `none`. Default: `first_top`.

annotation_personal_code.description: If set to `true` personal code will be visible in annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `false`.

allow_video_identification.description: Allow to sign using video-based identification. Default: `false`.

allow_document_saving.description: Allow user to save document to the Dokobit Portal and make further actions. Default: `true`.

flatten_pdf.description: If set to true the document will be flattened so that the form fields become part of the document content and cannot be edited after signing. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `false`.

allowed_signing_methods.description: Allow only specific signing methods. Available values: `mobile`, `smartid`, `smartcard`, `eparaksts_mobile`, `bankid_no`, `bankid_se`, `audkenni_app`, `ftn`, `mitid`, `electronic_id`, `itsme`, `idin`, `swisscom`, `sms_otp`.

files.description: File or files to be signed.

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system. You can generate unique random identifiers if you do not have one.

country_code.description: Participant's country code. Required if personal code is provided. Available values: `LT`, `LV`, `EE`, `IS`, `NO`, `FI`, `BE`, `SE`.

sequence.description: Allows setting up the sequence order of document approving and signing actions.

notifications_language.description: Sets the language for notifications. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`, `no`, `fr`, `se`, `de`, `fi`, `dk`, `nl`.

page.description: Page index for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

top.description: Position (in points) from top for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

left.description: Position (in points) from left for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

language.description: Language of visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system.

get.description: Returns document's information with signing status.

date_created.description: Date when document signing was initiated.

deadline.description: Signing deadline date with specified timezone fragment. Example: 2018-11-05T13:15:30Z.

post.description: Allows to send a reminder e-mail for participant, only if person has not signed document yet. Only works with external signing flow.
Indicated participants will gain access to the document with the selected role.

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system.

notifications_language.description: Sets the language for notifications. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`, `no`, 'fr', 'se', 'de'.

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system. You can generate unique random identifiers if you do not have one.

country_code.description: Participant's country code. Required if personal code is provided. Available values: `LT`, `LV`, `EE`, `IS`, `NO`, `FI`, `BE`, `SE`.

notifications_language.description: Sets the language for notifications. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`, `no`, `fr`, `se`, `de`, `fi`, `dk`, `nl`.

page.description: Page index for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

top.description: Position (in points) from top for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

left.description: Position (in points) from left for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

language.description: Language of visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`

post.description: Access to the document will be revoked for the indicated participant.
The document will be removed from the owner's account. It will remain accessible to other participants.
Allows to update attributes of an existing document signing.

deadline.description: Signing deadline date with specified timezone fragment. Example: 2018-11-05T13:15:30Z.

hard_deadline.description: If set to `true` participants won't be able to sign or approve this document after set `deadline`. Default: `false`.

require_qualified_signatures.description: Allow to sign only with qualified signatures. Default: `false`.

allow_video_identification.description: Allow to sign using video-based identification. Default: `false`.

allow_document_saving.description: Allow user to save document to the Dokobit Portal and make further actions. Default: `true`.

allowed_signing_methods.description: Allow only specific signing methods. Available values: `mobile`, `smartid`, `smartcard`, `eparaksts_mobile`, `bankid_no`, `bankid_se`, `audkenni_app`, `ftn`, `mitid`, `electronic_id`, `itsme`, `idin`, `swisscom`, `sms_otp`.

post.description: Internal signing initiates signing request from your system. In this case signing URL is generated where participant should be redirected.

redirect_uri.description: Redirect uri that will be used for redirecting signer after signing is completed.

postback_url.description: URL of your system to handle webhooks.

post.description: Document will be sealed with your organizations' electronic seal. Please contact our support at developers@dokobit.com to get a qualified certificate for e-sealing.

page.description: Page index for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

top.description: Position (in points) from top for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

left.description: Position (in points) from left for visible PDF signature annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `1`.

post.description: Document e-Delivery is used for securely sharing documents with Dokobit Universal API.

postback_url.description: URL of your system to handle webhooks.

files.description: File or files to be shared.

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system. You can generate unique random identifiers if you do not have one.

country_code.description: Recipient's country code. Required if personal code is provided. Available values: `lt`, `lv`, `ee`, `is`.

email.description: Recipient's email for sending document. Required if phone is not set.

phone.description: Recipient's phone number for sending document SMS. Required if email is not set. SMS will be sent only when email is not provided.

notifications_language.description: Sets the language for notifications. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `et`, `is`, `no`, 'fr', 'se', 'de'.

external_id.description: Unique random identifier of the participant from your system.

post.description: Dokobit is an eIDAS-certified service provider for qualified e-signature and e-seal validations. Use this action to upload a signed file for validation. Supported file types: `asice`, `asics`, `sce`, `bdoc`, `edoc`, `pdf`, `p7s`, `xml`.

get.description: Download detailed validation report in PDF.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Validation token received from DokobitUniversalAPIValidation action.
